fields.headline: Quick getaways
fields.bodyText: Under £200 Antique lovers weekend at The Spread Eagle Hotel in Thame, Oxfordshire 18 to 21 April. Two nights half board, entrance to the Easter Antiques Fair and entry ticket to Waddesdon Manor for £140. Call hotel (01844 213661). Under £300 £249 reduced to £149 for two nights in Prague throughout March with ShortBreaks (020 8289 8800). Accommodation is at the four star Rott Hotel a few steps from the Old Town Square. Departures Sunday to Wednesday from Stansted. Covers hotel with breakfast and flights. With Kirker (020 7231 3333) to Amsterdam for Van Gogh's 150th birthday celebrations. Your £222 covers a Van Gogh exhibition ticket, flights, transfers, two nights' B&B, tram pass and cruise. Up to 15 June. Mother's Day pampering in Paris at the four-star Villa Beaumarchais departing 28 March. £279 includes Eurostar, two nights' B&B, flowers and a day of beauty treatments. ShortBreaks (020 8402 0007). Under £400 Walking in the Isle of Mull for a week from 17 May appeal? The cost is £369 (single room) or £335 (sharing double or twin) inclusive full board but not transport Details from Walking Holidays Britain (01524 701431). Other walks available in Pembrokeshire, Donegal and the Western Highlands. Under £500 St Martin's on the Isle Hotel in the Scillies (01720 422090) has a reopening offer of £420 for guests staying four nights' half board up to the end of April. Peaceful, unspoilt, surroundings are assured. Under £600 £170 off seven nights' half-board at the four-star Hotel Bristol, Sorrento with Citalia (020 8686 5533) departing 11 April. Including flights and transfers, the cost is now £575. Four nights in Los Angeles and three in San Francisco for £569 with Bon Voyage (0800 316 0194) in March with flights from Heathrow or Manchester, internal flight and room-only at the Otani Hotel In LA and Clift Hotel in San Fran. Rio de Janeiro for five nights' B&B at the Rio Copa Hotel currently on offer with Kuoni (01306 747008) for £598. Includes flights from Heathrow and transfers. Under £700 Mad March offer from Magic of the Orient (01293 537700). Seven nights in Phuket staying at the five star Dusit Laguna resort at Bang Thao Bay. Reduced from £1201 to £695 includes flights, transfers, accommodation and the services of a local agent. A week's skiing in Whistler, Canada for £670. Self-contained accommodation at the Chalet Natasha, flights and transfers. Advantage Travel (0870 444 3493). Under £800 Depart Heathrow on 11 May for Valpolicella and Venice. Five nights at the Roxy Plaza Hotel in Soave, most meals and guided excursions with Lakes and Mountains Holidays (01329 844405). A chance to enjoy the region's culinary specialities for £739. Under £1,000 The Rolling Stones are performing live in China (Shanghai on 1 April and Beijing on 4 April). CTS Horizon (0207 836 9911) have four nights in Shanghai for £592, or four in Beijing for £662 or seven nights taking in both cities for £859. Prices are on a room only basis in three star hotel accommodation, flights are also included but not the cost of concert tickets. Departures from 28 March.
